explains: n. 控制，抑制；（对他国力量的）遏制
wordGroup: containment vessel 保护壳，安全壳；密闭壳
containment action 围堵措施；遏制措施

sentences.en: Fire crews are hoping they can achieve full containment of the fire before the winds pick up.
sentences.cn: 消防队员们希望他们能够在起风前对大火做到完全控制。
第二种情况是相互遏制。

sentences.en: Small spills and leaks inside containment.
sentences.cn: 容器内小的漏损和泄漏。
